text: allah, e prani painanu dani saktiki mincina bharam veyadu. Tanu sampadincina daniki (punya) phalitam daniki labhistundi mariyu tanu cesina duskarmala siksa adi anubhavistundi. O ma prabhu! Memu maracina leka tappu cesina mam'malni pattaku! O ma prabhu! Purvam varipai mopinatti bharam mapai mopaku. O ma prabhu! Memu sahancaleni bharam mapai veyaku. Mam'malni mannincu, mam'malni ksamincu mariyu mam'malni karunincu. Nive ma sanraksakudavu, kavuna satyatiraskarulaku virud'dhanga maku vijayamu (sahayamu) nosangu
